[[File:Hemianopsia.jpg|left|vignette|Goldman visual field showing left lateral homonymous hemianopia (top), and right lateral homonymous hemianopia (bottom). The diagrams represent what the patient sees (visual field of the right eye on the right, visual field of the left eye on the left)].

properties.question: In the case of homonymous lateral hemianopia, which area of the visual field is affected in each eye?
properties.option_c: Left upper quadrant of the right eye and right upper quadrant of the left eye
properties.option_d: Right lower quadrant of the right eye and left lower quadrant of the left eye
